Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Doorstep \Door"step`\, n. The stone or plank forming a step before an outer door. [1913 Webster]
doorstep n : the sill of a door; a horizontal piece of wood or stone that forms the bottom of a doorway and offer support when passing through a doorway [syn: {doorsill}, {threshold}]
